law.catch_line: Obstruction of public streets, highways, etc.

text.section:
Sec. 30-388.12. Obstruction of public streets, highways, etc.
It is unlawful for any person or persons to wilfully obstruct the free, convenient and normal use of any public street, highway or road, by impeding, hindering, stifling, retarding or restraining traffic or passage thereon, or by endangering the safe movement of vehicles or pedestrians traveling thereon.
